name: Dynamic Flux Entropy
description:
Dynamic Flux Entropy™️

Using the newly developed concept of entropic dynamic flux capacitance a new transport method for deployment in [REDACTED]-ships.

Due to [REDACTED] the [acceleration device] can not be disabled.

In this [REDACTED] world the [REDACTED]-ship travels to [REDACTED].

Controls
  • Left click to target orbits with your dynamic flux lock
  • Right click to exit orbits
  • Tab to switch module to construct (and show needed resources)
  • Space to construct selected module
  • Reaction Control System is controlled with A/D if you construct that module
